Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Voorn Van Dijk Smeets at a golf tournament in Amsterdam. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Voorn Van Dijk Smeets is a 38 year old CEO from Netherlands. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Voorn Van Dijk Smeets and Floor have been married since 2020. Together they have 2 kids called Schipper and Julia.
Education Background:
Voorn completed his secondary education at Hervormd Lyceum Zutphen in 2004.
Voorn completed his university education at Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences in 2010.
Additionally, he went on to study at Tio University of Applied Sciences until 2015.
Occupation History:
Voorn Van Dijk Smeets is a 38 year old and comes from Netherlands.
In 2011, Voorn Van Dijk Smeets started working as a Software Developer at GitPulse B.V., marking the beginning of his successful career.
He then transitioned to TomTom N.V. as a Startup Founder, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2012 to 2014.
His tenure as a CEO at GitPulse B.V. from 2014 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 460000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has villa located in Tilburg, worth 2790000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 2130000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2017, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Voorn has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
